cn show group data

Shows the group document. This document is shared among all group members.

cn show local data

Shows the local document. This document is stored locally, and private to this actor.

cn show sent list

Shows the list of sent messages with their expiry date, envelope hash, and content hash.

… ordered by id
… ordered by date
… ordered by envelope hash

Sorts the list accordingly. By default, the list is sorted by id.

Syntax

Open
